title: Spatially modulated 'Mottness' in La2-xBaxCuO4
abstract: Competition between magnetism and the kinetic energy of mobile carriers (typically holes) in doped antiferromagnets may lead to ‘stripe’ phases, which are charged rivers separating regions of oppositely phased antiferromagnetism. In copper oxides the main experimental evidence for such coexisting static spin and charge order comes from neutron scattering in La1.48Nd0.4Sr0.12CuO4 (LNSCO; ref. ) and La1.875Ba0.125CuO4 (LBCO; ref. ). However, as a neutron is neutral, it does not detect charge but rather its associated lattice distortion, so it is not known whether the stripes involve ordering of the doped holes. Here we present a study of the charge order in LBCO with resonant soft X-ray scattering (RSXS). We observe giant resonances near the Fermi level as well as near the correlated gap, demonstrating significant modulation in both the doped-hole density and the ‘Mottness’, or the degree to which the system resembles a Mott insulator. The peak-to-trough amplitude of the valence modulation is estimated to be 0.063 holes, which suggests an integrated area of 0.59 holes under a single stripe, close to the expected 0.5 for half-filled stripes.
abstract_cn: 在磁性和掺杂反铁磁体中移动载体（通常是空穴）的动能之间的竞争可能导致“条带化”。相，即带电的河流，将反相的反铁磁性区域分开。在氧化铜中，这种静态自旋和电荷序共存的主要实验证据来自La 1.48 Nd 0.4 Sr 0.12 CuO 4 （LNSCO;参考＆＃160;）和La 1.875 Ba 0.125 CuO 4 （LBCO;参考＆ ＃160;）。但是，由于中子是中性的，因此它不检测电荷，而是检测其相关的晶格畸变，因此不知道条纹是否包含掺杂空穴的有序性。在这里，我们对共振软X射线散射（RSXS）的LBCO中的电荷顺序进行了研究。我们在费米能级附近以及相关的间隙附近观察到巨大的共振现象，这表明掺杂孔密度和Mottness或系统与Mott绝缘子的相似程度都有明显的调制。价态调制的峰谷幅度估计为0.063孔，这表明在单个条带下的积分面积为0.59个孔，接近半填充条带预期的0.5。

title: Emergence of soliton chirality in a quantum antiferromagnet
title_cn: 量子反铁磁体中孤子手性的出现
abstract: Left- and right-handed chiral matter is present at every scale ranging from seashells to molecules to elementary particles. In magnetism, chirality may be inherited from the asymmetry of the underlying crystal structure, or it may emerge spontaneously. In particular, there has been a long-standing search for chiral spin states that emerge spontaneously with the disappearance of antiferromagnetic long-range order. Here we identify a generic system supporting such a behaviour and report on experimental evidence for chirality associated with the quantum dynamics of solitons in antiferromagnetic spin chains. The soliton chirality observed by polarized neutron scattering is in agreement with theoretical predictions and is a manifestation of a Berry phase. Our observations provide the first example of the emergence of spin currents and hidden chiral order that accompany the disappearance of antiferromagnetic order, a scheme believed to lie at the heart of the enigmatic normal state of cuprate superconductors.
abstract_cn: 从贝壳到分子再到基本粒子，从左到右都是手性物质。在磁性中，手性可以从下面的晶体结构的不对称性继承，也可以自发出现。特别地，长期以来寻找随着反铁磁远程有序消失而自发出现的手性自旋态。在这里，我们确定了支持这种行为的通用系统，并报告了与反铁磁自旋链中孤子的量子动力学相关的手性的实验证据。极化中子散射观察到的孤子手征性与理论预测相符，是贝里相的一种表现。我们的观察结果提供了第一个例子，表明自旋电流的出现和隐藏的手性有序伴随着反铁磁有序的消失，而反铁磁有序是被认为是铜酸盐超导体神秘正常状态的核心。

title: Formation of granular jets observed by high-speed X-ray radiography
title_cn: 高速X射线摄影观察到的粒状射流的形成
abstract: When a heavy sphere is dropped onto a bed of loose, fine sand, a remarkable phenomenon occurs: a large, focused jet of sand shoots upwards. Although similar looking jets are observed on impact in fluid systems, they are held together by surface tension. Surprisingly, the granular jet exists in the absence of both surface tension and cohesion, thus fluid jet models are of limited use. Previous work proposed that the jet is created solely by the gravity-driven collapse of a void left by the sphere’s descent through the pack. Here we present experimental evidence that granular jets are instead driven by a more complex process involving the interaction between the sand and interstitial air. Using high-speed X-ray radiography, and high-speed digital video, we observe the formation of the jet both inside and above the bed. We find that what previously was thought of as a single jet in fact consists of two components: a wispy, thin jet that varies little with pressure followed by a thick air-pressure-driven jet. This is further evidence that qualitatively new phenomena in granular systems can emerge as a function of air pressure. Our results highlight the importance of the dynamic coupling between gas and granule motion.
abstract_cn: 当重的球体落在松散的细砂床上时，会出现一种明显的现象：大而集中的喷砂向上射。尽管在流体系统中观察到相似的喷射流，但它们通过表面张力保持在一起。令人惊讶的是，在没有表面张力和内聚力的情况下存在粒状射流，因此流体射流模型的使用受到限制。先前的工作提出，射流完全是由重力驱动的球体下降穿过整个组件后留下的空隙塌陷而产生的。在这里，我们提供实验证据，表明颗粒状射流是由更复杂的过程驱动的，该过程涉及沙子和间隙空气之间的相互作用。使用高速X射线照相和高速数字视频，我们观察了床内和床上方射流的形成。我们发现，以前被认为是单个喷嘴的实际上是由两个部分组成的：一个纤细，细小的喷嘴，随压力变化很小，然后是一个由气压驱动的厚喷嘴。这进一步证明，颗粒系统中的定性新现象可以作为气压的函数出现。我们的结果强调了气体与颗粒运动之间动态耦合的重要性。

title: Oscillations with uniquely long periods in a microfluidic bubble generator
title_cn: 微流体气泡发生器中具有独特长周期的振荡
abstract: Understanding spatiotemporal complexity is important to many disciplines, from biology to finance. However, because it is seldom possible to achieve complete control over the parameters that determine the behaviour of real complex systems, it has been difficult to study such behaviour experimentally. Here we demonstrate a simple microfluidic bubble generator that shows stable oscillatory patterns (both in space and time) of unanticipated complexity and uniquely long repetition periods. At low flow rates, the device produces a regular stream of bubbles of uniform size. As the flow increases, the system shows intricate dynamic behaviour typified by a stable limit cycle of order 29 bubbles per period, which repeats without change over intervals of up to 100 periods and more. As well as providing an example of a well-characterized and experimentally tractable model system with which to study complex, nonlinear dynamics, such behaviour demonstrates that it is possible to observe complex and stable limit cycles without active external control.
abstract_cn: 了解时空复杂性对从生物学到金融学的许多学科都很重要。但是，由于几乎不可能完全控制确定实际复杂系统行为的参数，因此很难通过实验研究这种行为。在这里，我们演示了一个简单的微流体气泡发生器，该发生器显示出稳定的振荡模式（在空间和时间上），具有出乎意料的复杂性和独特的长重复周期。在低流速下，设备会产生规则大小的规则气泡流。随着流量的增加，系统显示出复杂的动态行为，其典型特征是每个周期有29个气泡的稳定极限周期，该极限周期在不超过100个周期或更长时间的间隔内不变。除了提供示例性良好且易于实验处理的模型系统以研究复杂的非线性动力学的示例外，此类行为还表明，无需外部主动控制即可观察复杂而稳定的极限环。

title: Soliton-pair dynamics in patterned ferromagnetic ellipses
title_cn: 图案化铁磁椭圆中的孤子对动力学
abstract: Confinement alters the energy landscape of nanoscale magnets, leading to the appearance of unusual magnetic states, such as vortices, for example. Many basic questions concerning dynamical and interaction effects remain unanswered, and nanomagnets are convenient model systems for studying these fundamental physical phenomena. A single vortex in restricted geometry, also known as a non-localized soliton, possesses a characteristic translational excitation mode that corresponds to spiral-like motion of the vortex core around its equilibrium position. Here, we investigate, by a microwave reflection technique, the dynamics of magnetic soliton pairs confined in lithographically defined, ferromagnetic Permalloy ellipses. Through a comparison with micromagnetic simulations, the observed strong resonances in the subgigahertz frequency range can be assigned to the translational modes of vortex pairs with parallel or antiparallel core polarizations. Vortex polarizations play a negligible role in the static interaction between two vortices, but their effect dominates the dynamics.
abstract_cn: 限制作用会改变纳米级磁体的能量分布，从而导致出现异常的磁态，例如涡旋。关于动力和相互作用影响的许多基本问题仍未得到解答，纳米磁体是研究这些基本物理现象的便捷模型系统。受限制的几何形状中的单个涡旋，也称为非局部孤子，具有特征性的平移激励模式，该模式对应于涡旋核围绕其平衡位置的螺旋状运动。在这里，我们通过微波反射技术研究限制在光刻定义的铁磁坡莫合金椭圆形中的磁孤子对的动力学。通过与微磁模拟进行比较，可以将在兆赫兹频率范围内观察到的强共振分配给具有平行或反平行磁芯极化的涡对的平移模式。涡旋极化在两个涡旋之间的静态相互作用中起着微不足道的作用，但是它们的作用支配着动力学。

title: Fault-tolerant architecture for quantum computation using electrically controlled semiconductor spins
title_cn: 使用电控半导体自旋进行量子计算的容错架构
abstract: Information processing using quantum systems provides new paradigms for computation and communication and may yield insights into our understanding of the limits of quantum mechanics. However, realistic systems are never perfectly isolated from their environment, hence all quantum operations are subject to errors. Realization of a physical system for processing of quantum information that is tolerant of errors is a fundamental problem in quantum science and engineering. Here, we develop an architecture for quantum computation using electrically controlled semiconductor spins by extending the Loss–DiVincenzo scheme and by combining actively protected quantum memory and long-distance coupling mechanisms. Our approach is based on a demonstrated encoding of qubits in long-lived two-electron states, which immunizes qubits against the dominant error from hyperfine interactions. We develop a universal set of quantum gates compatible with active error suppression for these encoded qubits and an effective long-range interaction between the qubits by controlled electron transport. This approach yields a scalable architecture with favourable error thresholds for fault-tolerant operation, consistent with present experimental parameters.
abstract_cn: 使用量子系统的信息处理为计算和通信提供了新的范例，并可能使我们对量子力学的局限性有了更深入的了解。但是，现实的系统永远不会与环境完美隔离，因此所有量子操作都容易出错。实现用于容错的量子信息的物理系统的实现是量子科学和工程学中的基本问题。在这里，我们通过扩展Loss＆＃8211; DiVincenzo方案，并结合了主动保护的量子存储器和长距离耦合机制，开发了一种使用电控半导体自旋的量子计算体系结构。我们的方法基于已证明的长寿命双电子态的量子位编码，可以对量子位进行免疫，以防止超精细相互作用产生的显性误差。我们开发了一套通用的量子门，与这些编码的量子位的主动错误抑制兼容，并且通过受控的电子传输在量子位之间进行了有效的远程相互作用。这种方法产生了可扩展的体系结构，该体系结构具有良好的容错操作错误阈值，与目前的实验参数保持一致。

title: Distributive immunization of networks against viruses using the 'honey-pot' architecture
title_cn: 使用“蜜罐”架构对网络进行分布式病毒免疫
abstract: Although computer viruses cause tremendous economic loss, defence mechanisms fail to adapt to their rapid evolution. Previous immunization strategies have been characterized as being static and centralized, which has made virus containment difficult or even impossible. We suggest, instead, to propagate the immunization agent as an epidemic. The main problem with epidemic vaccine propagation is that it is bound to lag behind the virus. We suggest giving the vaccine an advantage over the virus by allowing it to leapfrog through a separate, overlapping, partially correlated network. This enables the antivirus to contain the epidemic efficiently. We systemize this concept with a ‘honey-pot’ architecture that achieves both early virus discovery and rapid antivirus dissemination. We present analytic, as well as simulation, results for a set of realistic topologies that illustrate the effectiveness of this approach.
abstract_cn: 尽管计算机病毒会造成巨大的经济损失，但防御机制却无法适应其快速发展。 先前的免疫策略的特征是静态且集中的，这使得病毒遏制变得困难甚至不可能。 相反，我们建议将免疫剂传播为一种流行病。 流行疫苗传播的主要问题是，它势必落后于病毒。 我们建议通过使该疫苗越过单独的，重叠的，部分相关的网络，使该疫苗比该病毒更具优势。 这使防病毒有效地控制了流行病。 我们使用“蜜罐”将这一概念系统化。 同时实现早期病毒发现和快速防病毒传播的体系结构。 我们提供了一组实际拓扑的分析和仿真结果，这些结果说明了此方法的有效性。

title: High-efficiency carrier multiplication through direct photogeneration of multi-excitons via virtual single-exciton states
title_cn: 通过虚拟单激子态直接光生多激子来实现高效载流子倍增
abstract: We have previously demonstrated that absorption of a single photon by a nanocrystal quantum dot can generate multiple excitons with an efficiency of up to 100%. This effect, known as carrier multiplication, should lead to substantial improvements in the performance of a variety of optoelectronic and photocatalytic devices, including solar cells, low-threshold lasers and entangled photon sources. Here we present detailed analysis of the dynamics that govern the ultrafast growth of multi-exciton populations in CdSe and PbSe nanocrystals and propose a model of how such populations arise. Our analysis indicates that the generation of multi-excitons in these systems takes less than 200 fs, which suggests that it is an instantaneous event. We explain this in terms of their direct photogeneration via multiple virtual single-exciton states. This process relies on both the confinement-enhanced Coulomb coupling between single excitons and multi-excitons and the large spectral density of high-energy single- and multi-exciton resonances that occur in semiconductor nanocrystals.
abstract_cn: 我们之前已经证明，纳米晶体量子点吸收单个光子可以产生多个激子，效率高达100％。这种效应称为载流子倍增，应导致包括太阳能电池，低阈值激光和纠缠光子源在内的各种光电和光催化装置的性能得到实质性改善。在这里，我们提出了控制CdSe和PbSe纳米晶体中多激子族群超快增长的动力学的详细分析，并提出了一个模型来说明这些族群是如何产生的。我们的分析表明，在这些系统中多激子的产生花费不到200 fs，这表明这是一个瞬时事件。我们通过它们通过多个虚拟单激子状态的直接光生学来解释这一点。该过程既依赖于单激子与多激子之间的约束库仑耦合，也依赖于半导体纳米晶体中发生的高能单激子和多激子共振的大光谱密度。
